Detailed Description

A singleton class which contains the list with all the registered wxWebUpdateAction which are recognized in the webupdate script in installation stage.

To register a new wxWebUpdateAction-derived class, then do:

wxWebUpdateInstaller::Get()->AddActionHandler(new myDerivedAction);

Member Function Documentation

void wxWebUpdateInstaller::AddActionHandler (  wxWebUpdateAction *  custom  )  [inline]
 

Adds the handler for a new action.

To understand how to add support for a new action in the remote XML script, look at the WebUpdate docs.

wxWebUpdateAction * wxWebUpdateInstaller::CreateNewAction (  const wxString &  name,
const wxArrayString *  propnames,
const wxArrayString *  propvalues
) 
 

Creates a new action to handle an <actions> subtag with the given name.

The propnames and propvalues parameters are the array of the property names and property values found in the tag. This function is called by wxWebUpdateXMLScript only and should not be called by the user.

wxString wxWebUpdateInstaller::DoKeywordSubstitution (  const wxString &  str  ) 
 

Does substitutions on the given text and then returns it.

wxString wxWebUpdateInstaller::DoPathSubstitution (  const wxString &  str  ) 
 

Does the '//' string substitution; i.e.

substitutes the '//' characters into '\' char for win32 and '/' char for unix-based OS.

wxString wxWebUpdateInstaller::DoSubstitution (  const wxString &  str  )  [inline]
 

Does both the keyword and the path substitution.

void wxWebUpdateInstaller::FreeActionHashMap (   )  [virtual]
 

Removes all actions from the hash map.

void wxWebUpdateInstaller::FreeKeywords (   )  [virtual]
 

Does the cleanup for the keywords hashmap.

Since the hashmap cleans itself automatically when it's deleted, this function should just remove temporary files/folders/variables allocated by InitDefaultKeywords.

wxString wxWebUpdateInstaller::GetKeywordValue (  const wxString &  name  )  [inline]
 

Returns the value of the given keyword or wxEmptyString if such keyword does not exist.

wxVersion wxWebUpdateInstaller::GetVersion (   )  const [inline]
 

Returns the version of the local & remote XML scripts which are supported by this wxWebUpdateInstaller.

This version is also the version of the WebUpdater application.

void wxWebUpdateInstaller::InitDefaultActions (   )  [virtual]

int wxWebUpdateInstaller::ParsePairValueList (  const wxString &  str,
wxArrayString &  names,
wxArrayString &  values
) 
 

Parses the given comma-separed list of tokens in the form name=value and saves all the names & values in the two given wxArrayString.

Calls DoSubstitution on the values. Returns the number of names/values saved in the arrays.

static wxWebUpdateInstaller* wxWebUpdateInstaller::Set (  wxWebUpdateInstaller *  res  )  [inline, static]
 

previous one (may be NULL).

void wxWebUpdateInstaller::SetKeywordValue (  const wxString &  name,
const wxString &  val
)  [inline]
 

Creates a key with the given name & value.

If such key already existed, then it is overwritten.
